name: Psyblade
description: You rend the target with an ethereal blade. Make a melee attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE psychic damage on a hit. If you are on Electric Terrain, you make the attack with advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
